results.name: Binary encoding of 1-digits in ternary representation of A245612(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16383
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: A003961(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); \\ From A003961
A289813(n) = { my (d=digits(n, 3)); from digits(vector(#d, i, if (d[i]==1, 1, 0)), 2); } \\ From A289813
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 31 2018
